channel.title: R on erg home
channel.description: Recent content in R on erg home

item.description: Creating an engaged workforce ðŸ’– We apply behavioral principles and methods to answer questions of employee sentiment within the broader organizational system. An important component of this systemic change process includes our engagement survey developed in partnership with Eagle I.O. Engagement survey ðŸ’ƒ The engagement survey responses are evaluated against norms representing most major U.S. metropolitan areas, with sparser international representation (see Figure 1).

Process automation ðŸš€ We provide consultation on statistical and psychometric projects as well as helping organizations transition to -enabled automated work processes. Why ? Because it is: Powerful Flexible Free We rely on to drive all of our business functions[^foot]. For example, we use the platform to scrape data from websites, automate reports, and consolidate data into centralized repositories. The system that we use is generalizable - your needs are of course unique but can also be automated via application of standard principles.
